mapper.select: select count(*) loginResult, mid, name, grade from pcp_member where mid=#{mid} and pass=#{pass} group by mid, name, grade
mapper.delete: delete from pcp_member where mid=#{mid} and pass=#{pass}
mapper.select: select rownum rno,mid,pass,name,nickname,phone, to_char(to_date(birth),'yyyy-mm-dd') birth,email,addr, to_char(mdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') mdate,grade from (select mid,pass,name,nickname,phone,birth,email,addr,mdate,grade from pcp_member order by mdate)

select rno,mid,pass,name,nickname,phone,birth,email,addr,mdate from (select rownum rno,mid,pass,name,nickname,phone, to_char(to_date(birth),'yyyy-mm-dd') birth,email,addr, to_char(mdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') mdate,grade from (select mid,pass,name,nickname,phone,birth,email,addr,mdate,grade from pcp_member order by mdate)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select mid,pass,name,nickname,phone,to_char(to_date(birth),'yyyy-mm-dd') birth, email,addr,to_char(mdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') mdate,grade,mfile,msfile from pcp_member where mid=#{mid}
select count(*) from pcp_member where mid=#{mid}
select count(*) from pcp_member where email=#{email}
SELECT MID, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, MDATE FROM PCP_MEMBER WHERE MID LIKE '%'||#{mid}||'%'
select count(*) from pcp_member where mid = #{mid} and pass = #{pass}
